items.title: The Robot Report Enewsletter - The Robot Report
items.content_text: Need robotics news in a minute? We Deliver! The Robot Report Enewsletter gets you caught up on all the mission critical news you need in the world of robotics. Sign up today.

items.title: About The Robot Report
items.content_text: The Robot Report provides news, analysis, webinars, and events for engineers and developers of commercial robotics systems.

items.title: Robot Technologies: News and Product Announcements
2022 RBR50 Robotics Innovation Award Honorees - The Robot Report
items.content_text: For over a decade, Robotics Business Review’s RBR50 Robotics Innovation Awards have highlighted the most creative and influential innovations from around the world that have advanced the state of robotics. Widely recognized throughout the world as a leading indicator of robotics innovation leadership, the RBR50 Robotics Innovation Awards are also a critical measure of robotics…

items.title: 2021 RBR50 Robotics Innovation Awards Digital Edition - The Robot Report
items.content_text: Each year since 2012, Robotics Business Review has produced the RBR50 Robotics Innovation Awards, which recognize and celebrate forward thinking companies and the original, impactful solutions they have created. Widely recognized throughout the world as a leading indicator of robotics innovation leadership, the RBR50 Robotics Innovation Awards are also a critical measure of robotics sector…
